name: Abstract
description: Specifies whether this is an abstract parameter.

name: Constraint
description: Specifies a constraint value used by Studio to provide input validation for the parameter. Its value is not used nor enforced by the Class Compiler.

name: Deprecated
description: True if this parameter is deprecated.

name: Encoded
description: If true then the parameter value is base64 encoded.

name: Final
description: Specifies that subclasses cannot override the definition of the parameter.

name: Flags
description: Specifies any additional modifier flags for the parameter type.

name: Internal
description: If true, then do not display this item in automatic documentation.
